preBattleBriefing.title: Battle Briefing
preBattleBriefing.rollPrompt: If you are fighting an Invasion battle, you are simply here to survive. Otherwise roll D100 to determine if a Notable Sight is present.

sights.priority_target: Priority target: A random enemy figure gets +1 Toughness. If they are slain, gain 1D3 credits.
sights.loot_cache: Loot cache: Roll once on the Loot Table.
sights.person_of_interest: Person of interest: Gain +1 story point.
sights.curious_item: Curious item: Can be sold for 1 credit or rolled on the Loot Table.

small_encounter.name: Small Encounter
small_encounter.desc: A random crew member must sit out this fight. Reduce enemy numbers by -1 (-2 if they initially outnumber you).

poor_visibility.name: Poor Visibility
poor_visibility.desc: Maximum visibility is 1D6+8”. Reroll at the start of each round.

brief_engagement.name: Brief Engagement
brief_engagement.desc: At the end of each round, roll 2D6. If the roll is equal or below the round number, the game ends inconclusively.

toxic_environment.name: Toxic Environment
toxic_environment.desc: Whenever a combatant is Stunned, roll 1D6+Savvy skill (0 for enemies). Failure to roll a 4+ becomes a casualty.

surprise_encounter.name: Surprise Encounter
surprise_encounter.desc: The enemy can’t act in the first round.

delayed.name: Delayed
delayed.desc: 2 random crew members won’t start on the table. At the end of each round, roll 1D6: if the roll is equal or below the round number, they may be placed at any point of your own battlefield edge.

slippery_ground.name: Slippery Ground
slippery_ground.desc: All movement at ground level is -1 Speed.

caught_off_guard.name: Caught Off Guard
caught_off_guard.desc: Your squad all act in the Slow Actions phase in Round 1.

gloomy.name: Gloomy
gloomy.desc: Maximum visibility is 9”. Characters that fire can be fired upon at any range, however.

comms_interference.name: Comms Interference
comms_interference.desc: Each Reaction Roll phase, roll one die less than you normally would.

elite_opposition.name: Elite Opposition
elite_opposition.desc: All opponents with +0 Combat Skill are upgraded to +1.

heavy_opposition.name: Heavy Opposition
heavy_opposition.desc: Increase the opposing force by +2 enemies.

armored_opponents.name: Armored Opponents
armored_opponents.desc: All opponents with 3 Toughness are upgraded to 4.

enemy_captain.name: Enemy Captain
enemy_captain.desc: Add an additional Lieutenant with Combat Skill +2 and Toughness 5.
